text: chujonghadeon jadeul-i malhagil “man-yag uliege manhoeui gihoega iss-eossdeolamyeon geudeul-i ulilobuteo gyeolbaegham-eul seon-eonhan geoscheoleom ulido geudeullobuteo gyeolbaegham-eul seon-eonhaess-eul tende”. geuleohge hananimkkeseoneun geudeul-ege jasindeul-ui haeng-wileul boyeojusini geugeos-i geudeul-ui aetongham-i doemyeo geudeul-eun buljiog-eulobuteo nagajido moshadeola
